member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetAllEmployees
member.summary: Gets the list of all employees.
member.response: Returns the list of all employees.

member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetEmployeesBySalaryRange(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.response: Returns the list of employees within the salary range.
The maximum wage is less than the minimum salary.

member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetNonDuplicateEmployees
member.summary: Gets the list of all employees without duplicates.
member.response: Returns the list of all employees without duplicates.

member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetSalaryAdjustments
member.response: Returns the list of all employees with adjusted salaries.

member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetGenderPercentages
member.summary: Gets the gender percentages (male and female) of the employees.
member.response: Returns the gender percentages (male and female) of the employees.

member.name: M:MasterCompanyAPI.Controllers.EmployeeController.RemoveEmployee(System.String)
member.summary: Delete an employee by his ID number (Cédula).
member.response: The ID number doesn't match any of the records.
